chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This reference guide for the Spring Data GemFire project explains how to use Spring framework to configure and develop applications with vFabric GemFire. It presents the basic concepts, semantics and provides numerous examples to help you get started.
chapter.note: Spring Data GemFire started as a top level Spring project called Spring GemFire (SGF) and has since moved under the Spring Data umbrella project and has been renamed accordingly.
